divs: Sighting DetailsSo I'm sitting outside, smoking a cigarette looking at the sky because the sunset looks cool. When I notice something that should not be there, a light is just sitting in the sky it's not a plane because it isn't moving and it's not a star (stars don't "pulsate"). So I take out my phone and snap a pic. When you look at the photo it looks like a part of the sunset until I inverted the colors, the sky turns blue but this "object" turns black.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Easton
There were no other sightings in Easton on or around June 26th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
